dict.acceptation: 卫星；人造卫星；卫星国；卫星区；
通过通讯卫星播送[传播]；

sent.orig: The accuracy of satellite orbit determinationof satellite usage is compared for diffenent kinds of satellite.
sent.trans: 重点讨论了卫星定轨精度、卫星利用率等问题，比较了它们在区域卫星导航系统中的适用性。

sent.orig: This paper describes importance of satellite magnetic cleanliness, origin of satellite moment, its control and measure.
sent.trans: 本文叙述卫星磁洁净的重要性、卫星磁矩的来源、以及如何对磁矩进行控制和测量。

sent.orig: A multi-user transmitter is coupled to an earth satellite antenna to receive selectable satellite transponder signals.
sent.trans: 一个多用户发送器与一个地球卫星天线耦合以接收可选卫星转发器信号。

sent.orig: In the next 20 years, application satellite and satellite application is still field in space exploitation.
sent.trans: 在今后20年内，应用卫星和卫星应用仍将是空间开发的主战场。

sent.orig: Last year, Japan's satellite for lunar probes released two partners to fly the satellite.
sent.trans: 去年，日本的月球探测卫星释放了两个伴飞卫星。
